prompt_text: 3D clay model illustration of a traditional Black Forest cuckoo clock approximately 18–20 cm tall with a charming twist: the cuckoo bird replaced by a vintage broadcast microphone. Clock house crafted from warm terracotta and burnt-orange clay with classic alpine chalet styling, steep chocolate-brown roof, carved relief details, and a round cream-white clock face with embossed Roman numerals and ornate hands. Soft daylight, matte clay texture, warm editorial tone.

Soft 3D clay editorial illustration of a classic studio broadcast microphone on a small pedestal table, crafted in terracotta and chocolate-brown clay with visible handcrafted texture. Diffused daylight, matte finish, cozy professional atmosphere fitting Tonwerk’s branding.

Editorial 3D clay illustration showing a friendly workspace with a classic phone handset, notepad, and sound wave symbols subtly carved into clay. Warm beige background, gentle depth, handcrafted look matching Tonwerk style.

Minimal clay object depiction of a smooth, curved soundwave form emerging from a circular base. Crafted in warm orange and cocoa tones, matte lighting, Filament-style soft shadows. Modern and abstract brand symbol for Tonwerk.
3D editorial clay scene of a small audio studio desk: microphone, monitor speakers, notes, and a warm terracotta lamp. Balanced lighting, matte finish, cozy professional mood.

Stylized clay composition showing simplified round Tonwerk logo mark as if hand-sculpted from warm orange and beige clay, photographed under soft diffused light. Clean, minimal, texture-rich presentation for brand asset use.

Editorial 3D illustration in Tonwerk style: miniature clay scene of a modern office phone and microphone side by side on a warm clay desk surface, representing voice and telephony connection. Soft daylight, matte paper-clay texture, neutral beige backdrop.

Set of small 3D clay icons representing call flow elements — handset, headset, waveform, pause symbol, voicemail envelope — each crafted in Tonwerk’s warm terracotta color palette. Matte lighting, consistent handcrafted texture.

Clay editorial illustration of a small record player-like turntable symbolizing hold music, made of warm orange clay with subtle grooves. Gentle diffused light, matte texture, cozy audio branding mood.

Soft 3D editorial composition with several Tonwerk objects arranged: phone handset, microphone, waveform, music note. Balanced light beige and burnt-orange palette, shallow depth of field, warm professional tone.
